subject: Sim racing clutch pedal
description_text:
Hello!
In November 2023 I purchased the Pro Pedal set (throttle and brake) and now
I would like to add a clutch pedal, but want to make sure I get a clutch
pedal assembly that is compatible with the pedal setup that I have. Can you
help me choose the correct one?
Thank you
John

1625 N. Lincoln Ave Loveland, Co 80538
(970) 667-5400

conversations.body_text: Hi John Schneible, you can purchase this Plus X clutch, and you will also need to purchase a Plus X control box. https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black

My existing control box has a spot for a clutch pedal, can I use that with
the Plus X pedal? Or will I need 2 control boxes now?


1625 N. Lincoln Ave Loveland, Co 80538
(970) 667-5400

On Fri, Sep 26, 2025, 3:28 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi John Schneible,  Your old control box is also compatible with the PlusX clutch, but we recommend upgrading to a PlusX control box. It supports the latest version of SIMSONN Manager and the vibration telemetry interface, offering more features and a better overall experience.
